md:
giải nghĩa từ "lou" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Lou (noun) - Lò, bếp
	* Meaning: A furnace or oven for heating or burning something.
	* Example sentence: "The blacksmith used the lou to heat up the metal."
	* Related words: furnace, oven, stove

2. Lou (verb) - Giảm, hạ
	* Meaning: To reduce or lower something.
	* Example sentence: "The company will lou the price of the product to attract more customers."
	* Related words: reduce, lower, decrease

3. Lou (adjective) - Yếu, nhẹ
	* Meaning: Weak or faint.
	* Example sentence: "The lou signal from the radio made it difficult to hear."
	* Related words: weak, faint, soft

4. Lou (interjection) - Ồ, ồ
	* Meaning: An expression of surprise or excitement.
	* Example sentence: "Lou! I didn't expect to see you here!"
	* Related words: wow, oh, ah
html:
giải nghĩa từ "lou" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Lou (noun) - Lò, bếp

    • Meaning: A furnace or oven for heating or burning something.
    • Example sentence: "The blacksmith used the lou to heat up the metal."
    • Related words: furnace, oven, stove

  2. Lou (verb) - Giảm, hạ

    • Meaning: To reduce or lower something.
    • Example sentence: "The company will lou the price of the product to attract more customers."
    • Related words: reduce, lower, decrease

  3. Lou (adjective) - Yếu, nhẹ

    • Meaning: Weak or faint.
    • Example sentence: "The lou signal from the radio made it difficult to hear."
    • Related words: weak, faint, soft

  4. Lou (interjection) - Ồ, ồ

    • Meaning: An expression of surprise or excitement.
    • Example sentence: "Lou! I didn't expect to see you here!"
    • Related words: wow, oh, ah
